ComicInfo.Title: Part 3: Together Again for the First Time
ComicInfo.Summary: Chricton manages to escape to Diagnosan's enclave, and is surprised to see both Grunchlk and Sikozu alive there. Sikozu informs him that he and the rest of the galaxy have been infected by Whaela'an virus - developed in enclave as part of an experiment to learn more about viruses by enlarging them. Meanwhile, virus is spreading throughout the galaxy - Moya is starving Pilot, Chiana, Aeryn and Jothee are trying to kill each other, Rygel refuses to leave his room, and Grayza is about to kill her child.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 08:44:22. [CVDB162521]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Dennis Calero, Joe Corroney, Will Sliney
ComicInfo.Inker: Dennis Calero, Joe Corroney, Will Sliney
ComicInfo.Characters: Aeryn Sun, Ahkna, Chiana, John Crichton, Jothee, Moya, Pilot, Rygel, Sikozu
